The Astral Plane

The Astral Plane is base form of the immaterium, the invisible neighbour of the materium. It appears as a vast void, populated only by strange nebulae, eldritch creatures, and pockets of activity centred around areas which are populous in the materium, such as Spires, Planets, and Spacecraft. The atman which gather around such places are often varying magnitudes of hunger, who wait with mouths open and claws readied to grasp at any atman newly freed from its mortal shell. Such creatures dip periodically into Ethereal, where they can see into The Material Plane, and sense new death over great distances.
